    üöï Rezerwacja transportu

    Wype≈Çnij 4 kroki i zarezerwuj przejazd bez wychodzenia ze strony g≈Ç√≥wnej.

    Krok 1 z 4: Trasa i harmonogram

    1. Route and schedule

    Step 1/3: choose route and time first. If you select Round trip, complete both outbound and return schedules here.

    Return leg

    Set return pickup, destination, date and time. Address and flight details for return are completed in step 3.

    2. Passengers and extras

    Step 2/3: set passengers and extras. Price updates automatically after every change.

    Return passengers and extras

    Use this only when return trip differs from outbound values.

    3. Contact and trip notes

    Step 3/3: add contact details and exact trip instructions. Required address/flight fields change automatically based on selected locations.

    Outbound trip details

    Add exact location details for outbound trip. Requirements are updated from selected route.

    Return trip details

    Add exact location details for return trip. Requirements are updated from selected return route.

    Total quote

    Review full price calculation before you reserve transport.

    • Outbound leg total‚Äî
    • Return leg total‚Äî
    • Base fare‚Äî
    • Extra passengers‚Äî
    • Extra small backpacks‚Äî
    • Extra large bags (15kg+)‚Äî
    • Child + booster seats‚Äî
    • Waiting fee‚Äî
    • Coupon discount‚Äî
    Total ‚Äî

    To confirm this booking

    After driver availability is confirmed, check your email for a payment link. Pay ‚Äî to confirm your reservation. Remaining ‚Äî will be paid in cash to the driver on-site.
